wikipedia_page.main: Edward Owens (7 November 1913 – 1980), often known as Tussy Owens, was a footballer who played in the Football League for Preston North End and Crystal Palace as a defender. He also played in non-league football for Bath City.

response: *Ted Owens (basketball) (born 1929), fifth head basketball coach of the Kansas Jayhawks
